Bring Your Home
Keep your home and live here!
Call today
for lot availability and incentives.
Resident Referral
Thank you for being a valued resident.
Make money now by referring a friend/family/co-workers.
Payment Calculator
Find out how low your payments could be with our simple
mortgage calculator tool
.
Contact Us at Shangri-La
We want to make your home ownership dreams into a reality. We look forward to hearing from you, discussing your options, and helping you find the perfect manufactured home.
Contact us today by filling out the form below or simply call us at
(888) 728-1287
for more information.
Contact Shangri-La
Shangri-La
2850 New Tampa Highway
Lakeland, FL 33815
(863) 825-7865
